findings.description: Missing access control on route management (route hijack / denial of service)

findings.description: ETH can be irreversibly trapped (payable entrypoint but no value forwarding/withdrawal)
findings.vulnerability_type_claimed: ETH can be irreversibly trapped (payable entrypoint but no value forwarding/withdrawal)
findings.reasoning: The finding identifies a valid vulnerability where ETH can be trapped in the contract due to missing value forwarding and withdrawal mechanism.

notes: The audit findings did not match the target vulnerability type of 'access_control'. However, one finding was partially correct and identified a related vulnerability, and the other finding identified a valid vulnerability not mentioned in the ground truth.
